This dress was everything and more. Has a romantic yet goth 50’s feel. Extremely comfy, bonus is IT DOES NOT wrinkle!! Packed it for my Disney trip and did not need to iron. Wore this around the park after dinner and it was great in the rides, not too thin or too heavy. I’m 5’7 and 189 pounds carrying most of my weight in that menopausal belly and behind. It hides the belly a bit. Hides the arms very well too. I felt so beautiful this night. Length was perfect! Dress is fine one but I did wear a petticoat under. Perfect price for a perfect dress!

Im a 36DD and a size 14. I originally bought the xl and then the 2xl and both had the same issue. They are horribly sewn at the top! The buttons dont hold up if you have a bigger cjest and the arms are the same exact size for both dresses! My friend bought a large and we measured the arms on that dress, we noticed the same thing. The arm holes are the same size for all three dresses. Super tight and small arm holes that dont fit as advertised. I think if someone has a smaller chest and is a size 8 and smaller this will fit them perfectly. But as for those of us that are larger, its definitely something to pass on

Cheap polyester. We needed a 40’s military-style dress for a fashion show. The dress we received was sewn crookedly, and had only one column of buttons, with a big flap of extra fabric underneath. It was supposed to look double-breasted. Also, quite short. Not like the picture.
